hero.p: EV Tours & Charter is a family business run by dad and daughter team John and Elyce, who are dedicated to providing you with exceptional transport experiences tailored to your needs.

sections.heading: Passion project turned professional
text: EV Tours & Charter was founded by the Director Elyce, who got her start organising winery tours and hens party outings for her friends.
Elyce’s knack for logistics, attention to detail, and extensive local knowledge earned her rave reviews, prompting her to turn her passion into a professional venture.

sections.heading: From a single bus to a fleet
text: What started as a single bus operation blossomed into a fleet of buses, with Elyce’s dad John joining her to share his business and mechanical expertise.
EV Tours & Charter quickly grew to be the preferred charter service for the Mornington Peninsula, and have since expanded to service all of Victoria as well as offering interstate travel.

sections.heading: Onward and upward
text: As we look to the future, we are excited to continue expanding our services and exploring new destinations.
We’re all about keeping the focus on the customer as we grow, making sure we continue providing the same personal touch that has made us a favourite, even as we add new services.

sections.heading: Family owned and operated
text: Our family-oriented approach means you can expect personalised attention and care.
We offer a transport experience that goes beyond just getting you from point A to point B.

sections.heading: Our experience and expertise
text: With years of experience in the transport industry, we blend youthful energy with reliable service.
We’ve been at this for years, so we know how to make your trip smooth and stress-free.

sections.heading: Personalised service
text: Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction is what sets us apart.
Once you’ve experienced the EV difference, you won’t want to go anywhere else!

cta.heading: Let us help you with your next trip
text: With our dedicated team and family-focused approach, we’re here to ensure your journey is smooth and memorable.
Whether you're planning a winery tour, a special event, or a day out with friends, we can’t wait to help you create lasting memories.
